item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 11 Jul 2023
item.description:
1. opam 2.2.0~alpha release!
  2. Initial Emissions Monitoring of the OCaml.org Infrastructure
  3. Autofonce, a modern runner for GNU Autotests suites
  4. First beta release of OCaml 5.1.0
  5. Dream-html - DSL to build HTML, integrated with Dream
  6. ppx_subliner 0.2.0
  7. happy-eyeballs, dns, http-{lwt,mirage}-client ++ writeup of happy-eyeballs issue and fix
  8. Getting started with ReasonReact and Melange
  9. Making OCaml 5 Succeed for Developers and Organisations
  10. Llama, an OCaml library for declaratively building software-defined modular synthesizers
  11. dune 3.9.0
  12. Depending on non-OCaml languages from the opam repository
  13. Status of DkML Windows
